00038 void
00039 GenericVcArbiter::request (Flit* f, uint vc)
00040 {
00041     requests[vc] = true;
00042     flits[vc] = f;
00043     return ;
00044 }               /* -----  end of function GenericVcArbiter::request  ----- */
00045 
00046 Flit*
00047 GenericVcArbiter::pull_winner ()
00048 {
00049     if ( !done )
00050         pick_winner();
00051 
00052     done = false;
00053 
00054     if ( !requests[ last_winner ])
00055     {
00056         _DBG("GenericVcArbiter:: Invalid flit exception last_winner %d", last_winner);
00057         exit(1);
00058     }
00059 
00060     requests[last_winner] =  false;
00061     return flits [last_winner];
00062 }               /* -----  end of function GenericVcArbiter::pull_winner  ----- */
00063 
00064 bool
00065 GenericVcArbiter::is_requested( uint ch )
00066 {
00067     /*  Check for exceptions here is ch greater than requests size */
00068     if( ch > requests.size())
00069     {
00070         _DBG(" Invalid VC Exception req_vc: %d ", ch);
00071         cout.flush();
00072         exit(1);
00073     }
00074 
00075     return requests[ch];
00076 }               /* -----  end of function GenericVcArbiter::ready  ----- */
00077

00079 GenericVcArbiter::get_no_requests ()

00081     return requests.size();
00082 }               /* -----  end of function GenericVcArbiter::size  ----- */

00084 void
00085 GenericVcArbiter::set_req_queue_size ( uint size)
00086 {
00087     requests.resize(size);
00088     flits.resize(size);
00089     next_port.resize(size);
00090     for ( uint i=0 ; i<size; i++ )
00091         requests[i] = false;
00092 
00093     return ;
00094 }               /* -----  end of function GenericVcArbiter::resize  ----- */
00095 
00096 uint
00097 GenericVcArbiter::pick_winner ()
00098 {
00099     if ( !done )
00100     {
00101         done = true;
00102         for ( uint i=last_winner+1 ; i<requests.size() ; i++ )
00103             if ( requests[i] )
00104             {
00105                 last_winner = i;
00106                 return i;
00107             }
00108 
00109         for ( uint i=0 ; i<last_winner+1 ; i++ )
00110             if ( requests[i])
00111             {
00112                 last_winner = i;
00113                 return i;
00114             }
00115     }
00116     else
00117     {
00118         return last_winner;
00119     }
00120     _DBG("GenericVcArbiter:: pick_winner error... dint find a winner %d", last_winner);
00121     exit(1);
00122 
00123     return -1;
00124 
00125 }               /* -----  end of function GenericVcArbiter::pick_winner  ----- */
00126 
00127 uint
00128 GenericVcArbiter::pick_winner( vector<bool> ready )
00129 {
00130     if (ready.size() != requests.size())
00131     {
00132         _DBG("\nInvalidReadySizeException GenericVcArbiter::pick_winner ready_size: %d req_size:%d", ready.size(), requests.size());
00133         exit(1);
00134     }
00135 
00136     if(!done)
00137     {
00138         done = true;
00139         for( uint i=last_winner+1; i<requests.size(); i++)
00140             if(requests[i] && ready[i])
00141             {
00142                 last_winner = i;
00143                 return i;
00144             }
00145 
00146         for ( uint i=0; i<last_winner+1; i++)
00147             if( requests[i] && ready[i] )
00148             {
00149                 last_winner = i;
00150                 return i;
00151             }
00152     }
00153     else
00154     {
00155         return last_winner;
00156     }
00157 
00158     _DBG("GenericVcArbiter:: NOREQUESTSEXCEPTION %d ", last_winner);
00159     return -1;
00160 }

00174 bool
00175 GenericVcArbiter::empty ()
00176 {
00177     bool ty = true;
00178     for ( uint i=0 ; i<requests.size() ; i++ )
00179         ty = ty & !requests[i];
00180 
00181     return ty;
00182 }               /* -----  end of function GenericVcArbiter::empty  ----- */
00183 
00184 bool
00185 GenericVcArbiter::empty ( vector<bool> ready)
00186 {
00187     if( ready.size() != requests.size() )
00188     {
00189         _DBG(" InvalidReadySizeExp empty(ready) %d ", requests.size());
00190         exit(1);
00191     }
00192 
00193     bool ty = true;
00194     for ( uint i=0; i<requests.size(); i++ )
00195     {
00196         ty = ty & !(requests[i] & ready[i]);
00197     }
00198     return ty;
00199 }               /* -----  end of function GenericVcArbiter::empty  ----- */
